post:
[**Tragic Servers**](https://www.tragicservers.com/) is having a Monster Deal this week in celebration for Halloween. Receive 40% off recurring for our Open VZ SSD and KVM servers. Be sure to apply promo code: **"SPOOKY"** to receive these scary prices. Each order link includes the promo code, and will be applied on the final checkout page.

**Looking Glass Links**

[**Chicago**](http://chi.lg.tragicservers.com/)

[**Los Angeles**](http://lax.lg.tragicservers.com/)
